text:
Great question, <@URC2M9CAV>. When you say there’s no login system, do you mean your website doesn’t have a login (or do you mean HubSpot doesn’t have that feature)? I’m assuming you mean your site doesn’t have it, as well as it not being a feature in HubSpot.

Someone else may have some other suggestions for you, but my first thought is on the Events feature. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/events/create-custom-events> This is available to Marketing Hub Enterprise only, though - is that the product you have?

But note that if you want to associate those Events with specific contacts in HubSpot you will need to collect their email address at some point - either through a HubSpot form or via API and your own form. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>
